channel.title: Thirty Seconds To Mars on
channel.description: Recent content in Thirty Seconds To Mars on

item.title: Attack
item.description: [[songs/t/taproot/bluesky_research/calling.md#your-ccccalling-but-i-cant-hear-you-vyl-wnanory|I won’t suffer, be broken, get tired, or wasted]] [[songs/t/taproot/bluesky_research/calling.md#your-ccccalling-but-i-cant-hear-you-vyl-wnanory|Surrender to nothing, or give up what I]] [[songs/t/taproot/bluesky_research/calling.md#your-ccccalling-but-i-cant-hear-you-vyl-wnanory|Started and stopped it, from end to beginning]] [[songs/t/taproot/bluesky_research/calling.

item.title: Closer To The Edge
item.description: [[songs/d/deadmau5/album_title_goes_here/telemiscommunications.md#plan-foiled-vyl-wnanory|I don’t remember the moment I tried to forget]] [[songs/d/deadmau5/album_title_goes_here/telemiscommunications.md#plan-foiled-vyl-wnanory|I lost myself, is it better not said?]] [[songs/d/deadmau5/album_title_goes_here/telemiscommunications.md#plan-foiled-vyl-wnanory|Now I’m closer to the edge]] [[songs/s/skinny_puppy/the_process/hardset_head.

item.title: From Yesterday
item.description: [[songs/t/the_fair_sex/labyrinth/run_and_hide.md#im-not-dead-yet-vyl-wnanory|He’s a stranger to some and a vision to none]] [[songs/t/the_fair_sex/labyrinth/run_and_hide.md#im-not-dead-yet-vyl-wnanory|He can never get enough, get enough of the one]] [[songs/t/the_fair_sex/labyrinth/run_and_hide.

item.title: Hurricane
item.description: [[songs/a/architects/daybreaker/devils_island.md#the-city-streets-you-used-to-love-vyl-wnanory|No matter how many times that you told me you wanted to leave]] [[songs/a/architects/daybreaker/devils_island.md#the-city-streets-you-used-to-love-vyl-wnanory|No matter how many breaths that you took you still couldn’t breathe]] [[songs/a/architects/daybreaker/devils_island.

item.title: Kings and Queens

item.title: The Kill
item.description: [[songs/b/boy_harsher/country_girl_uncut/swing.md#my-knees-touch-the-floor-the-couch-is-nice-and-soft-and-possibly-velvet-of-the-lightest-color-blue-vyl-wnanory|What if I wanted to break?]] [[songs/b/boy_harsher/country_girl_uncut/swing.md#my-knees-touch-the-floor-the-couch-is-nice-and-soft-and-possibly-velvet-of-the-lightest-color-blue-vyl-wnanory|Laugh it all off in your face?]] [[songs/b/boy_harsher/country_girl_uncut/swing.md#my-knees-touch-the-floor-the-couch-is-nice-and-soft-and-possibly-velvet-of-the-lightest-color-blue-vyl-wnanory|What would you do?]] [[songs/b/boy_harsher/country_girl_uncut/swing.md#my-knees-touch-the-floor-the-couch-is-nice-and-soft-and-possibly-velvet-of-the-lightest-color-blue-vyl-wnanory|What if I fell to the floor?

item.title: This Is War
item.description: [[songs/i/in_flames/siren_charms/filtered_truth.md#or-is-this-what-you-were-searching-for-vyl-wnanory|A warning to the people, the good and the evil]] [[songs/i/in_flames/siren_charms/filtered_truth.md#or-is-this-what-you-were-searching-for-vyl-wnanory|This is war]] [[songs/i/in_flames/siren_charms/filtered_truth.md#or-is-this-what-you-were-searching-for-vyl-wnanory|To the soldier, the civilian, the martyr, the victim]] [[songs/i/in_flames/siren_charms/filtered_truth.
